description: Flag HTML elements assigned invalid or deprecated ARIA role values that break accessibility APIs.
recommendation: Use only valid ARIA role values and ensure the role matches native element semantics or is accompanied by required attributes. (WCAG 2.1 SC 4.1.2)
algorithm: Flags role attributes whose values are not in the allowed ARIA role list.
algorithm_advanced: Regex-scans role attributes and validates against the allowed role whitelist.
